mapper.select: SELECT MESSAGE_ID messageId, SENDER_NO senderNo, USER_NAME senderName, CONTENT content, SENT_DATE sentDate FROM TB_TEAM_MESSAGE JOIN TB_USER ON(USER_NO = SENDER_NO) WHERE MESSAGE_ID = #{messageId}
SELECT DECODE(COUNT(*), 0, 1, 0) FROM TB_TEAM_MESSAGE WHERE MESSAGE_ID = #{messageId}
SELECT DECODE(COUNT(*), 0, 1, 0) FROM TB_TEAM_MESSAGE WHERE MESSAGE_ID = #{messageId} AND SENDER_NO = #{senderNo}
